about:
I am a dedicated and passionate AI/ML Engineer, Freelancer, and SaaS Solutions Developer. My expertise lies in building intelligent systems, including AI-powered chatbots, NLP solutions, recommendation engines, and computer vision applications. I specialize in leveraging deep learning, transformers, and large language models to solve real-world problems.

Beyond work, I enjoy exploring cutting-edge AI research, optimizing machine learning models, and contributing to AI-driven innovations. My goal is to establish a successful AI business that delivers transformative solutions in automation, decision intelligence, and conversational AI.
